title: Veer
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Font Retailers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Retailers) : Veer**

Veer provides visual elements for use in professional creative work, such as graphic design, motion design, advertising and filmmaking. Products include stock photography, illustration, maps, typefaces, and unique design-related merchandise. Products are showcased on the website [veer.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/www.veer.com/) and in regular direct-mail [catalogs](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/www.veer.com/ideas/catalogs/).

As part of the company's ongoing involvement in the design community, the creative folks at Veer also maintain [The Skinny](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/blog.veer.com/), a lively design and pop-culture influenced weblog. Veer also hosts the type-related animated shorts ["Behind the Typeface: Cooper Black"](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/www.veer.com/ideas/btt/) and ["Etched in Stone"](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/www.veer.com/ideas/etched/) -- both produced by Typophile regular [Cheshire Dave](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cheshire%20Dave).

Veer sells fonts from the following foundries: [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe), [Alias](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alias), [Atomic Media](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Atomic%20Media), [Cabinet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cabinet), [Device](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Device%20Fonts), [Elsner+Flake](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Elsner%2BFlake), [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau), [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fountain), [G-Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/G-Type), [IHOF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/IHOF), [Jukebox](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jukebox), [Lanston Type Co.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lanston%20Type%20Co.), [Letraset Fontek](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Letraset%20Fontek), [Mean Tangerine](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mean%20Tangerine), [P22](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22), [Red Rooster](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Red%20Rooster), [Rimmer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rimmer%20Type%20Foundry), [Sherwood](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sherwood%20Type%20Collection), [ShinnType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ShinnType), [Test Pilot Collective](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Test%20Pilot%20Collective), [Type Trust](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20Type%20Trust), [Umbrella](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Umbrella), and [Virus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023120/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Virus).
author: Grant Hutchinson
